/usr/bin/c++  -std=c++11 -static-libstdc++ -g CMakeFiles/cuda_testprj.dir/cuda_testprj_generated_main.cu.o CMakeFiles/cuda_testprj.dir/chapter5/cuda_testprj_generated_sharedMemoryTest.cu.o CMakeFiles/cuda_testprj.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o cuda_testprj   -L/home/lgj/test_cudaprj/CUDA_LIBS  -L/usr/local/cuda/lib64/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda/lib64  -Wl,-rpath,/home/lgj/test_cudaprj/CUDA_LIBS /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so -lpthread -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
